features: BPA/BPS Free. So you can drink water that's safe and tastes great
Built to Last. Our durable goods are made to last a lifetime
Dishwasher Safe. Safe to put in the dishwasher and easy to clean
Fits Cupholders. This bottle fits in cupholders so you can take it with you on the road or at the gym
Fits Ice Cubes. Put ice in your bottle with ease and enjoy your frosty beverage anywhere
Leak-Proof Guarantee. Continuous, straight shouldered semi-buttress threads keep the bottle sealed tight
Bottle Made In the USA. Local goods mean local jobs and fewer emissions
Lightweight. Engineered to count for when weight matters most.
